channel.title: Mezzyscape 562 (Loading 657)

item.title: Mezzyscape 562 (Loading 657)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“coolguy12123, post:9, topic:408367”]Hey guys. Finally, you put up this awesome server. Curse those mods for deleting the mezzyscape server. Quick question, you remember in mezzy’s original post, there were many problems with the compilers and run.bat files. Are they fixed? Or do they need to be changed?

Edit: Mezzy, you should definetly make a version 2 and fix all of the problems with the server, and add nex, because I don’t think that this awesome server deserves to die. So please make a v2 and fix all of the curses/barrage and other problems. I would appreciate that a lot! Thank you. :)[/quote]

all compilers work fine - no errors / runs perfectly fine

item.title: Mezzyscape 562 (Loading 657)
item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123
item.description:
@coolguy12123 wrote:

Hey guys. Finally, you put up this awesome server. Curse those mods for deleting the mezzyscape server. Quick question, you remember in mezzy’s original post, there were many problems with the compilers and run.bat files. Are they fixed? Or do they need to be changed?

Edit: Mezzy, you should definetly make a version 2 and fix all of the problems with the server, and add nex, because I don’t think that this awesome server deserves to die. So please make a v2 and fix all of the curses/barrage and other problems. I would appreciate that a lot! Thank you.
